DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate urinary function one year single incision sling placement time robotic sacrocolpopexy . The thought minimally-invasive , single incision sling would provide similar subjective success rate retropubic trans-obturator sling .
DOC.brief_title: Single Incision Suburethral Sling Time Robotic Sacrocolpopexy
DOC.criteria: patient undergo single incision sling placement time robotic sacrocolpopexy study period previous surgical treatment stress urinary incontinence ( SUI )
